Anne Leontievna Leontiev

F, #103301, d. 1706

Last Edited=22 Nov 2002

Anne Leontievna Leontiev was the daughter of Leonti Leontiev and Praskovia Rayevska. She died in 1706.

Child of Anne Leontievna Leontiev and Kirill Poleukhtevitch Narischkine

Natalia Kirilovna Narishkina+ b. 1 Sep 1651, d. 4 Feb 1694

Praskovia Rayevska

F, #103303, d. 1641

Praskovia Rayevska was the daughter of Ivan Rayevski. She died in 1641.

Nikolai Nikolaievich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia

M, #103304, b. 8 August 1831, d. 25 April 1891

Last Edited=1 Apr 2007

Consanguinity Index=1.25%

Grand Duke Nicholas Nicolaievich of Russia1

Nikolai Nikolaievich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia was born on 8 August 1831 [27 July 1831 O.S.] at Tsarskoie Selo, Russia .2 He was the son of Nikolai I Pavlovich Romanov, Tsar of Russia and Friederike Luise Charlotte Wilhelmine Prinzessin von Preußen. He married Alexandra Friederike Wilhelmine von Holstein-Gottorp, Herzogin von Oldenburg, daughter of Constantine Friedrich Peter von Holstein-Gottorp, Herzog von Oldenburg and Therese Prinzessin von Nassau-Weilburg, on 5 February 1856 [25 Jan 1856 O.S.] at St. Petersburg, Russia .2 He died on 25 April 1891 at age 59 at Tsarskoie Selo, Russia .2

He gained the title of Grand Duke Nikolai Nikolaievich of Russia.3

Children of Nikolai Nikolaievich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia and Alexandra Friederike Wilhelmine von Holstein-Gottorp, Herzogin von Oldenburg

Nikolai Nikolaievich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia4 b. 18 Nov 1856, d. 5 Jan 1929

Petr Nikolaievich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia+4 b. 22 Jan 1864, d. 17 Jun 1931

Mikhail Nikolaievich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia

M, #103305, b. 25 October 1832, d. 18 December 1909

Last Edited=1 Apr 2007

Consanguinity Index=1.25%

Grand Duke Michael Nicolaievich of Russia1

Mikhail Nikolaievich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia was born on 25 October 1832 [13 Oct 1832 O.S.] at Peterhof Palace, St. Petersburg, Russia .2 He was the son of Nikolai I Pavlovich Romanov, Tsar of Russia and Friederike Luise Charlotte Wilhelmine Prinzessin von Preußen. He married Cäcilie Olga Prinzessin von Baden, daughter of Leopold I Großherzog von Baden and Sophie Wilhelmine von Holstein-Gottorp, Princess of Sweden, on 28 August 1857 at St. Petersburg, Russia .2 He died on 18 December 1909 at age 77 at Cannes, France .2

He gained the title of Grand Duke Mikhail Nikolaeivich of Russia.3

Children of Mikhail Nikolaievich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia and Cäcilie Olga Prinzessin von Baden

Alexandra Friederike Wilhelmine von Holstein-Gottorp, Herzogin von Oldenburg1

F, #103306, b. 2 June 1838, d. 25 April 1900

Last Edited=10 May 2003

Consanguinity Index=0.72%

Alexandra Friederike Wilhelmine von Holstein-Gottorp, Herzogin von Oldenburg was born on 2 June 1838 [21 May 1838 O.S.] at St. Petersburg, Russia .2 She was the daughter of Constantine Friedrich Peter von Holstein-Gottorp, Herzog von Oldenburg and Therese Prinzessin von Nassau-Weilburg.1 She married Nikolai Nikolaievich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia, son of Nikolai I Pavlovich Romanov, Tsar of Russia and Friederike Luise Charlotte Wilhelmine Prinzessin von Preußen, on 5 February 1856 [25 Jan 1856 O.S.] at St. Petersburg, Russia .2 She died on 25 April 1900 at age 61 at Kiev, Ukraine .2

She gained the title of Herzogin von Oldenburg.3 From 5 February 1856, her married name became Romanov Herzogin von Oldenburg.2

Children of Alexandra Friederike Wilhelmine von Holstein-Gottorp, Herzogin von Oldenburg and Nikolai Nikolaievich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia

Nikolai Nikolaievich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia4 b. 18 Nov 1856, d. 5 Jan 1929

Cäcilie Olga Prinzessin von Baden1

F, #103307, b. 2 October 1839, d. 12 April 1891

Last Edited=25 Mar 2012

Consanguinity Index=4.07%

Cäcilie Olga Prinzessin von Baden was born on 2 October 1839 at Karlsruhe, Baden-Württemburg, Germany.1 She was the daughter of Leopold I Großherzog von Baden and Sophie Wilhelmine von Holstein-Gottorp, Princess of Sweden.1 She married Mikhail Nikolaievich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia, son of Nikolai I Pavlovich Romanov, Tsar of Russia and Friederike Luise Charlotte Wilhelmine Prinzessin von Preußen, on 28 August 1857 at St. Petersburg, Russia .1 She died on 12 April 1891 [31 Mar 1891 O.S.] at age 51 at Kharkov, Ukraine .1

From 28 August 1857, her married name became Olga Feodorovna Romanov.1

Children of Cäcilie Olga Prinzessin von Baden and Mikhail Nikolaievich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia

Nikolai Mikhailovich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia1

M, #103308, b. 14 April 1859, d. 30 January 1919

Last Edited=10 May 2003

Consanguinity Index=1.91%

Nikolai Mikhailovich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia was born on 14 April 1859 at Tsarskoie Selo, Russia .1 He was the son of Mikhail Nikolaievich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia and Cäcilie Olga Prinzessin von Baden. He died on 30 January 1919 at age 59 at Fortress of Peter and Paul, St. Petersburg, Russia , shot by the Bolsheviks.1

He gained the title of Grand Duke Nikolai Mikhailovich of Russia.1 He was a historian.

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 321. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

Mikhail Mikhailovich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia1

M, #103309, b. 16 October 1861, d. 26 April 1929

Last Edited=7 Dec 2014

Consanguinity Index=1.91%

Mikhail Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia 2

Mikhail Mikhailovich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia was born on 16 October 1861 at Peterhof Palace, St. Petersburg, Russia .3 He was the son of Mikhail Nikolaievich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia and Cäcilie Olga Prinzessin von Baden. He married Sophie Nikolaievna von Merenberg, Countess de Torby, daughter of Nikolaus Wilhelm Prinz von Nassau-Weilburg and Nataliya Aleksandrovna Pushkina, Gräfin von Merenberg, on 10 March 1891 [26 Feb 1891 O.S.] at San Remo, Italy , in a morganatic marriage.3 He died on 26 April 1929 at age 67 at London, England .3

He gained the title of Grand Duke Mikhail Mikhailovich of Russia.1

Children of Mikhail Mikhailovich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia and Sophie Nikolaievna von Merenberg, Countess de Torby

Anastasia Mikhailovna de Torby, Countess de Torby+3 b. 9 Sep 1892, d. 7 Dec 1977

Mikhail Mikhailovich de Torbay, Count de Torby3 b. 8 Oct 1898, d. 8 May 1959
